official.headline: Empathy Uplift Sweeps City
official.anchor_line: Residents experience increased BCI scores as acts of kindness energize communities across Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: This positive surge reflects the adaptive strength of our city's systems, guiding cooperative values and enhancing collective well-being.

underground.headline: Kindness Spike - Or Control?

underground.contextual_reframing: Whispers point to secret code tweaks after Halden's death. Now, everyone's faking empathy to survive - welcome to Stenograd's latest experiment.
